post.text: The Obama-Clinton economy has DEVASTATED our hard-working families. As president, I will renegotiate NAFTA, stop foreign nations from cheating us, and cut taxes to reopen factories. America will stand STRONG on the world stage once again! #AmericaFirst

comment.author: Stevey
comment.text: Could someone please confirm news I read (Boston tribune?) that Obama kids grandmother whose lived in White House so called cares for her grandchildren...gets a $160,000 lifetime pension just for whatever loophole they could find to justify this travesty of our tax dollars?

replies.author: Kc
replies.text: We are winning. They are trying to steal the election! https://youtu.be/zaOoFH8HHrk

replies.text: This is an atrocity to you, but Donald Trump not paying taxes isn't?
